name:
SAMURAI WARRIORS:
Chronicles 3
description:
The Latest sequel of "SAMURAI WARRIORS Chronicles" is now on the Nintendo 3DSâ„¢!

Switch between up to four playable characters in real time, and use the "Hyper Attacks" to make this the most strategically rich title in the series to date!

The new "Challenge Mode" allows you to tackle a series of objectives, one after the other, with a time limit, and reach your final goal! You can even check your rankings against other warriors online!

Weapon upgrades, custom parts and more make this a truly immersive title.
